arts.ttl: Tietz penalty secures victory for Augsburg against struggling Bochum
arts.sum: Augsburg secured a vital 1-0 win against bottom club Bochum in the Bundesliga, with Phillip Tietz's penalty deciding a closely contested match at the WWK Arena. The half also saw yellow cards for Alexis Claude-Maurice and Marius Wolf of Augsburg, adding to the match's intensity.

arts.ttl: Ermedin Demirović rescues point for VfB Stuttgart in Bremen thriller
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart's Ermedin Demirović forced an impressive Werder Bremen side to settle for a 2-2 draw in a thrilling encounter on Bundesliga Matchday 12. Stuttgart, however, refused to be deterred and found their equaliser in the 20th minute through Demirović .

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs Bochum preview: Huge bottom-half clash
arts.sum: Augsburg aim to create some breathing room from the relegation battle as they welcome bottom-placed VfL Bochum to the WWK Arena on Saturday for their 12th fixture of the 2024-25 Bundesliga season.

arts.ttl: Preview: Augsburg vs. VfL Bochum - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and VfL Bochum, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
After European games for some German clubs in midweek, it is a return to Bundesliga action this weekend with Alex Jack taking us through all nine games.
